name: Teatime Trader
description:
Made for Trijam #156 - Theme: "Teatime".

It took me 2 hours, 40 minutes and 11.80 seconds to make this, according to my Stopwatch. 

Welcome to Teatime Trader!

The goal of the game is quite simple - use various method to make money, and make a million pounds to win!

Make sure not to let your tiredness reach 100% by drinking some nice tea, but watch out, tea gets more expensive each time you drink it!

The music is "Habanera", by Bizet(sorry Classified Composer).

Voices were done by The Dictator.

If you enjoyed the game, consider supporting me on Patreon.

For a somewhat-similar experience, check out Code Collapse!
